name: phonehome
description: Monitor the status of your #CraftCMS projects remotely

scripts.docs:dev: VITE_PHONEHOME_PLUGIN_VERSION=$(npm run version:get) vitepress dev docs
scripts.docs:build: VITE_PHONEHOME_PLUGIN_VERSION=$(npm run version:get) vitepress build docs
scripts.docs:serve: VITE_PHONEHOME_PLUGIN_VERSION=$(npm run version:get) vitepress serve docs

author: Zaengle
